text: aur jahaan kaheen unapar qaaboo pao, qatl karo aur unhen nikaalo jahaan se unhonne tumhen nikaala hai, isalie ki fitana (utpeedan) qatl se bhee badhakar gambheer hai. lekin masjide haraam (kaaba) ke nikat tum unase na lado jab tak ki ve svayan tumase vahaan yuddh na karen. atah yadi ve tumase yuddh karen to unhen qatl karo - aise inakaariyon ka aisa hee badala hai
